text: Marhatopan do sude jolma taringot tu saluhutna i, sisada parsorion do halak partigor dohot halak parjahat, halak na denggan dohot na pita marroha, songon halak na ramun; halak na pasahathon pelean, songon halak na so mamele halak na daulat, songon halak pardosa; halak panolonnolon songon halak na mabiar manolon.
